Posted By: JFM2796 (8/22/2011 12:12:02 AM)

posts.post_content: There are a few reasons why this exciting. Firstly it extends the reach of white decks. It allows you to get the last few life out of an opponent if they stall you. Secondly, It curves nicely into a flicker deck. You play him turn two, maybe attack with it on turn three then target him with [flickerwisp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=flickerwisp ) that same turn. I am excited about that because I have been having trouble thinking of good two drops to flicker.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
@donovanfabian:
  
   
I love how you noted that suture priest and this card are in the same block, I hadn't noticed actually. (Zzzz). How about you put those two together. And maybe a glimmer point stag, journey to nowhere and venser to sojourner. Then bounce this guy until the cows come home. Gain life with the suture priest when he enters, make them lose life and you neer have to attack.
  
   
This card is golden, and you'll just have to figure out how to get two plains on the field for those dual color decks.... So difficult lol.
  
   
THis deck is on mtgdeckbuilder.betanet under user vakyoom.

posts.post_content: @kiseki: A good two drop in a flicker deck? Check out [Wall of Omens](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall of Omens) and [Meddling Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Meddling Mage). You might not want to flicker the meddling mage straight away, but it is a WAY better two drop than this. So is Wall of Omens. Its also WW instead of 1W, which makes it harder for dual color decks. (And I assume your flicker deck isnt mono color..)
posts.html:

posts.post_content: This card looks terrible to me.. I mean really, they printed it at the same time as suture priest, which is likely to give you more bang for it's mana cost, and it costs only 1 white compared to this exarchs 2 white so it is more splashable. The only advantage to this one is if you can blink it like with venser or glimmerstag, but then it really doesn't go into a blink deck, since there are cooler things that you can do by blinking other creatures like a wall of omens.
posts.html:
